verbs.description: [ARG0: i] [V: went] [ARG1: on the slinky dog dash coaster in disney world] [ARGM-TMP: on opening day] the slinky dog dash is the crown jewel in disney hollywood studio new toy story land i rode the roller coaster on its opening day and was pleasantly surprised by the experience i thoroughly enjoyed my experience and i think the coaster is more than worth the long wait edge park orlando florida andy walt disney world resort hollywood big thunder mountain railroad magic kingdom
